name: Kaymbu
description: Kaymbu is the leading visual messaging and authentic assessment platform for early education.  From photo sharing to student portfolios, school newsletters and dynamic photo books, Kaymbu connects early childhood educators with young, digital-native parents.  Kaymbu captures the essence of student development and strengthens relationships between home and school.

Product
[![Green checkmark icon indicating completed tasks or verified items in Kaymbu.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6736547e98bf69c280989672/6760d203e24b181ce54712e6_check-assesment-icon.svg)AssesmentChild development assessment](http://kaymbu.com/</products/assesment>)[![Blue calendar icon representing scheduling and planning features in Kaymbu.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6736547e98bf69c280989672/673a7e218fe1d3908b80f56c_calendar-range%201.svg)Instructional PlanningLesson planning with integrated curriculum](http://kaymbu.com/</products/instructional>)[![Pink family icon symbolizing parent-teacher communication in Kaymbu.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6736547e98bf69c280989672/673a88f0b32cf036259b75d1_family-dress%201.svg)Family EngagementSchool-family communication in 100+ languages](http://kaymbu.com/</products/family-engagement>)[![Orange graduation cap icon representing educational progress tracking in Kaymbu.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6736547e98bf69c280989672/673a896780806ed847fc6ac1_graduation-cap%201.svg)Training and SupportOngoing support and online training available](http://kaymbu.com/</products/support-training>)

Built for EducatorsLoved by Families
Kaymbu equips early childhood educators with the best assessment, instructional planning, family engagement, and professional development tools to drive positive outcomes for every child.
[Get Started](http://kaymbu.com/</contact/get-started>)
![Kaymbu digital interface displaying colorful icons of children's items and an organized table for activity planning](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67280d7d5c9215694a8cf984/67281d619a8da8508cb86fcb_image.png)![List view of activities with toy icons and text descriptions.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67280d7d5c9215694a8cf984/67281d6231a072a6d5196663_Second-Illustration-Container.png)![Profile card showing a child smiling with painted hands and a toy icon.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67280d7d5c9215694a8cf984/67281d6241155c1f03820926_Vectors-Wrapper.svg)
![waves used to separate sections](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67280d7d5c9215694a8cf984/673189fa041605fbea329958_Vectors-Wrapper.svg)
Empower Early Learning with Kaymbu
Transform early education with tools that simplify lesson planning, assessments, and family engagement. Join Kaymbu to make learning organized and impactful.
[Get Started](http://kaymbu.com/</contact/get-started>)
Empower Early Learning with Kaymbu
Transform early education with tools that simplify lesson planning, assessments, and family engagement. Join Kaymbu to make learning organized and impactful.
Get Started
![waves used to separate sections](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6736547e98bf69c280989672/67373dae12ee8565b38972fc_waves-invert.svg)
Why Kaymbu?
Empowering Educators with Essential Tools
Discover a platform that enhances early childhood education with tools for assessments, planning, and engagement.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6736547e98bf69c280989672/673744ef6e64b3cc6d9ca420_circle-illustration.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67280d7d5c9215694a8cf984/67297b65b14d764a469478fa_Vectors-Wrapper.svg)
Our Mission in Early Childhood Education
At Kaymbu, we empower educators with resources that make learning accessible and engaging.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67280d7d5c9215694a8cf984/673191e477d329006e993b7c_Vectors-Wrapper.svg)
Transforming Learning Experiences
Kaymbu offers user-friendly solutions to simplify daily activities and boost educational success.
Kaymbu Features
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67280d7d5c9215694a8cf984/67319734dbcf5e76852d6f0a_Vectors-Wrapper.svg)
Authentic Assessment
Kaymbu’s COR Advantage offers a research-backed assessment to help early childhood programs prepare children for success.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6736547e98bf69c280989672/673a7e218fe1d3908b80f56c_calendar-range%201.svg)
InstructionalPlanning
Plan and document intentional teaching activities with customizable tools, easily shareable with families and educators.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6736547e98bf69c280989672/673a88f0b32cf036259b75d1_family-dress%201.svg)
FamilyEngagement
Kaymbu’s COR Advantage offers a research-backed assessment to help early childhood programs prepare children for success.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6736547e98bf69c280989672/673a896780806ed847fc6ac1_graduation-cap%201.svg)
Professional Development
Enhance learning with accessible virtual workshops and resources for professional growth.
Empower Early Learning with Kaymbu
Transform early education with tools that simplify lesson planning, assessments, and family engagement. Join Kaymbu to make learning organized and impactful.
Get Started
Empower Early Learning with Kaymbu
Transform early education with tools that simplify lesson planning, assessments, and family engagement. Join Kaymbu to make learning organized and impactful.
[Get Started](http://kaymbu.com/</contact/get-started>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6736547e98bf69c280989672/673a9e089ababb22e624a529_wave-separator.svg)
What EducatorsAre Saying About Kaymbu
“Kaymbu has completely transformed how we communicate with families. Sharing photos, videos, and daily updates is so easy, and the feedback from families has been phenomenal. They feel more connected than ever to what’s happening in the classroom.”
Rachel Lopez
Pre-K Teacher, Austin, TX
“Using COR Advantage alongside Kaymbu has made tracking developmental progress seamless. The observation tools are intuitive, and the insights help us tailor learning experiences to each child’s needs. It’s a game-changer for our program!”
Michael Rivera
Program Director, Denver, CO
“I love how Kaymbu allows us to create beautiful, professional portfolios effortlessly. It’s amazing to have everything—photos, observations, and assessments—in one place to share with families and administrators.”
Sandra Wu
Lead Teacher, Boston, MA
“The daily sheets in Kaymbu are a lifesaver! Families love receiving real-time updates about meals, naps, and activities, and it helps us maintain transparency. It’s the best tool for building trust with families.”
Emily Johnson
Infant Room Teacher, Chicago, IL
“Kaymbu is incredibly user-friendly, even for those who aren’t tech-savvy. Their support team is amazing—they’re always quick to help with any questions we have. It’s been the easiest system to implement at our center.”
David Thompson
Center Administrator, Orlando, FL
“The reporting features in Kaymbu save us so much time. Whether it’s tracking developmental insights or attendance, the data is clear and easy to pull. It’s helped us focus more and stress less!”
Jonathan Kim
Assistant Director, San Francisco, CA
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6736547e98bf69c280989672/673a9dab342deb5c46deb743_arrow-left.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6736547e98bf69c280989672/673a9dab342deb5c46deb744_arrow-right.svg)

generated_description:
**Kaymbu: Empowering Early Education**

Kaymbu is an innovative visual messaging and assessment platform tailored for the early education sector. Launched with the mission to enhance communication between educators and the digital-native parents of young children, Kaymbu offers tools that capture student development and foster strong relationships between home and school.

### Core Offerings

- **Assessment Tools:** Kaymbu provides evidence-based frameworks, like COR Advantage, which facilitate authentic assessments to track child development effectively.
- **Instructional Planning:** Educators can streamline their lesson planning with integrated resources tailored for early childhood education, allowing for intentional teaching strategies.
- **Family Engagement:** The platform supports communication in over 100 languages, making it easier for teachers to share updates, photos, and videos that keep families informed and connected.
- **Training & Support:** With ongoing online training and support, Kaymbu ensures that educators are equipped to utilize their tools effectively.

### Target Markets and Solutions

Kaymbu caters primarily to early childhood educators, including those in Head Start programs, state preschools, and private childcare centers. They align their tools with various state standards, helping programs enhance their quality and meet assessment requirements. Essentially, Kaymbu combines multiple functions into a single platform—turning complex processes into streamlined activities that foster child learning and growth.

### Company Overview

- **Founded:** While the exact founding date isn't specified, Kaymbu is a proud member of the Y Combinator Batch IK12. 
- **Location:** Based in Boston, Massachusetts, Kaymbu currently has a team of 11 dedicated employees.
- **Website:** Interested parties can learn more or get started by visiting [Kaymbu](http://kaymbu.com).

### Testimonials & Impact

Educators have expressed profound satisfaction with Kaymbu's capabilities. Teachers appreciate the ease of sharing real-time updates with families, which enhances classroom transparency and trust. Feedback highlights that Kaymbu not only simplifies processes but creates a more engaging and connected learning environment for children and families alike.

Overall, Kaymbu stands as a beacon for early educators, equipped with tools designed not just for efficiency but for nurturing meaningful developmental experiences for young learners.
